participant_1.background:
I miss the days of being a kid, but I'm trying to make the best of my current situation.
I love to cook and try new recipes, but I usually end up making campfire stew because it's my favorite.
I just got back from visiting my family
I have two loves: my family and travel.
I often neglect my own creative work in favor of my job.

participant_2.background:
I love cooking for my family and friends, and my cat loves to eat it too!
I cherish my dog's ashes.
My family supports me in my cycling and college studies.
i grew up with 6 siblings.
I've learned to forgive myself for the mistakes I've made in the past.

content.text: Hello! I just got back from visiting my family and I miss them already.
Hello! It's nice to meet you. I have a big family too and I miss them when I'm away.
I love cooking for my family and friends, and my favorite recipe is campfire stew.
I love cooking for my family and friends too! My cat loves to eat my cooking too!
I miss being a kid, but I'm trying to make the best of my current situation.
I grew up with 6 siblings and we had a lot of fun growing up. I've learned to forgive myself for the mistakes I've made in the past.
I love traveling and my family is my biggest support. I often neglect my own creative work in favor of my job.
My family is very supportive of my cycling and college studies. I cherish my dog's ashes and they are my most prized possession.
